alert.note: Alert for Ritchie; Roane; Wirt; Wood (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 4:45AM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Washington, southwestern Ritchie, Wirt, northern Roane and Wood Counties through 530 AM EDT... At 444 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lubeck, or near Belpre, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Parkersburg, Belpre, Elizabeth, Vienna, Washington, Mineralwells, Lubeck, Reedy, Cherry, Peewee, Walker, Palestine, Lucille, Freeport, Blennerhassett, Davisville, Greencastle, Morristown, Rockport, and Macfarlan. This includes the following highways... Interstate 77 in West Virginia between mile markers 158 and 176. Route 50 in West Virginia between mile markers 1 and 14. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
